Translations.Text: Innellezine teveffahumul melaiketu zalimi enfusihim kalu fime kuntum kalu kunna mustad’afine fil ard(ardı), kalu e lem tekun ardullahi vasiaten fe tuhaciru fiha fe ulaike me’vahum cehennem(cehennemu) ve saet masira(masiran)
Illel mustad’afine miner ricali ven nisai vel vildani la yestatiune hileten ve la yehtedune sebila(sebilen)
Fe ulaike asallahu en ya’fuve anhum ve kanallahu afuvven gafura(gafuren)

Ve men yuhacir fi sebilillahi yecid fil ardı muragamen kesiren veseah(veseaten), ve men yahruc min beytihi muhaciren ilallahi ve resulihi summe yudrikhul mevtu fe kad vakaa ecruhu alallah(alallahi), ve kanallahu gafuran rahima(rahimen)
